The game‚Äôs disastrous launch has been covered a thousand times from every angle; it was an intricate mess of overlapping problems that made the game difficult to play and extremely clippable for memes. But in 2024, the beleaguered game is stepping into the spotlight and enjoying a wave of positive attention. Bet...

item.content:encoded: Photo: Hasbro Alliances will launch alongside the new 5th edition version of the game Talisman: The Magical Quest Game, one of the OG dungeon crawlers, is back with a 5th edition release arriving on July 1. But Hasbro‚Äôs Avalon Hill imprint has more than just retro vibes on its mind. The company has also revealed Talisman: Alliances - Fate Beckons, an expansion arriving alongside the revamped board game. It will offer a cooperative mode of play for the first time in the franchise‚Äôs 41-year hist...

item.description: Photo: Critical Role ‚ÄòWe come alive‚Äô during those performances, says CEO Travis Willingham Critical Role is no stranger to live performances ‚Äî at gaming conventions, livestreamed in movie theaters, ...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Critical Role ‚ÄòWe come alive‚Äô during those performances, says CEO Travis Willingham Critical Role is no stranger to live performances ‚Äî at gaming conventions, livestreamed in movie theaters, or most recently at London‚Äôs Wembley Arena. In fact, the actual play troupe that cut its teeth on Dungeons & Dragons (before building its own systems) has a live show coming up on June 15 in Los Angeles. And it‚Äôs at the historic Greek Theatre, no less! But CEO Travis Willingham sees an opportunity t...

item.content:encoded: Image: Studio Zero/Atlus, Sega A familiar step in a bold new direction Metaphor: ReFantazio‚Äôs developers are not being subtle about the themes they‚Äôre seeking to tackle in this game. The upcoming RPG takes place in a medieval setting that is a mirror to our contemporary world. The world-within-a-world depiction of a utopia, illustrated as a modern city during a cutscene, is considered an anomaly. The game‚Äôs characters read about it in a book, in which it‚Äôs told that no soul is born into discri...

item.content:encoded: Image: Krafton OMG the girls look so good It seems like no world ‚Äî physical nor digital ‚Äî is immune to the girly pop flair of NewJeans. The globally famous K-pop group made its debut in PlayerUnknown‚Äôs Battlegrounds as part of the 30.1 update on Wednesday. The collaboration adds each member of the group as a playable character, adorable accessories to dress up your characters, emotes for popular dances set to songs like ‚ÄúOMG,‚Äù and more. Equal parts bizarre and wonderful, the PUBG update has al...

item.description: Image: Jackbox Games A free release for July 2024 The Jackbox Party Packs are getting a much-needed quality of life improvement ‚Äî a singular source from which all Jackboxes may flow. Today, Jackbox ...
item.content:encoded: Image: Jackbox Games A free release for July 2024 The Jackbox Party Packs are getting a much-needed quality of life improvement ‚Äî a singular source from which all Jackboxes may flow. Today, Jackbox Games announced The Jackbox Megapicker, a free product for Steam that allows players to put their various Game Packs under one umbrella. The Megapicker will release in July. As a regular Jackbox Games host, I can attest this has been sorely needed. There are a lot of minigames over the 10 Jackbox Pa...

item.content:encoded: Image: Riot Games No one wants to play with your $500 skin League of Legends‚Äô latest skin has proven controversial with the community. The Immortalized Legend Ahri skin was designed to commemorate Faker as the first pro player inducted into Riot‚Äôs League of Legends esports Hall of Fame, called the Hall of Legends. To mark the occasion, the skin has an optional extra tier that costs about $500 to unlock. While many fans objected to the price tag online right away, their displeasure has now move...

item.content:encoded: Image: Ravensburger/Disney You can reserve Shimmering Skies products ahead of the Aug. 23 launch The next expansion for Disney Lorcana, Shimmering Skies, launches on Aug. 23. While previous Lorcana expansions have been available to pre-order through multiple retailers, Shimmering Skies products are currently only available through Best Buy. Shimmering Skies brings a number of new Disney characters to the existing roster, introducing Venelope Von Schweetz and Wreck-it Ralph in addition to new v...

item.content:encoded: Image: Massive Entertainment/Ubisoft How can ISAC be real if our eyes aren‚Äôt real? The Division franchise is best known for being a post-apocalyptic looter shooter, set in an alternate timeline where society collapsed due to a large-scale biological attack. Since The Division‚Äôs launch in 2016, Ubisoft‚Äôs developers have been telling a long-running story around a mysterious rogue agent. The Division 2‚Äôs most recent update includes a twist that is so implausible and goofy that it wraps all the wa...

item.content:encoded: IMAGE: Pontypants and SungWon Cho via Polygon Boy, this game sure is something SungWon Cho returned to Polygon‚Äôs airwaves this week with a very special, very chaotic livestream! The voice actor and YouTuber, along with Polygon host Simone de Rochefort, were given a simple challenge: play A Difficult Game About Climbing. If you‚Äôre familiar with this game, then you already know how absurd it is. But add in Crowd Control mods and a series of in-studio physical challenges, and the results are... d...
